text: Hi everyone. We’ve had two apps for a few years now but when trying to create a third one, the Create app button is greyed out and the App ID, Client ID, Client secret and Install URL (OAuth) empty. Anyone else stuck at this stage?
I am not sure if that is the reason but you have to have a redirect url setup now.
That isn’t. Had to create a new developer account for it to let me create a new app
